content:
by Jordan Pottorff
Sports EditorNovember  

The New Era of Eastern football ended with a first round playoff loss as the Panthers fell to South Dakota State  Saturday in Brookings SD PERIOD



The Jackrabbits were led by sophomore running back Zach Zenners careerbest performance as he totaled  rushing yards and three touchdowns on  carries PERIOD Each of his three touchdowns came in the opening half as the Jackrabbits took a commanding  lead into the halftime break PERIOD

Backup running back Reggie Gandy also performed well in the running game rushing for  yards and two touchdowns on  carries PERIOD

South Dakota State quarterback Austin Sumner threw for  yards and a touchdown while completing just  of his  pass attempts PERIOD Sumners lone touchdown pass was hauled in by fullback Cam Jones PERIOD Aaron Rollin led all receivers with  yards on five receptions PERIOD

Defensively the Jackrabbits kept the highpowered Eastern offense in check limiting them to just  yards of total offense PERIOD

Eastern quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo threw for  yards and an interception PERIOD Garoppolo fell just  yards short of breaking Sean Paytons singleseason passing yard record but did surpass Paytons school record for total offense in a singleseason PERIOD Garoppolo also fell three touchdowns short of tying former Eastern quarterback Tony Romo for the school record for touchdown passes in a singleseason PERIOD

Redshirt junior wide receiver Erik Lora led all receivers totaling  yards on  receptions PERIOD Lora finished the season with an FCS record of  receptions to go along with  receiving yards PERIOD He fell just  yards short of setting the FCS record for receiving yards in a singleseason PERIOD

In the running game Eastern was led by redshirt senior running back Jake Walker as he totaled  rushing yards and a touchdown on  carries PERIOD

The Panthers finished the  season with an overall record of  PERIOD South Dakota State will advance to the second round to take on the defending national champions North Dakota State PERIOD

Jordan Pottorff can be reached at  or emailprotected PERIOD
